name: Coal miner worker's compensation for surviving spouse
description: Compensation to surviving spouses of coal miners totally disabled by or whose deaths are attributable to black lung disease (pneumoconiosis).
fullDescription: Compensation to surviving spouses of coal miners totally disabled by or whose deaths are attributable to black lung disease (pneumoconiosis).
whatTheyOffer: Promotes and improves the welfare, working conditions, opportunities, benefits and rights of wage earners, job seekers, and retirees of the United States.
howToGetIt:
Eligibility requirements:
- The deceased worked in the coal mines and their death was due to black lung disease (pneumoconiosis)
- The applicant's relationship to the deceased is: spouse

Visit the official website or call for more information.
